title: Game crashing in loading screen
body:
When ever i try to load into a game my lol will crash after a second or two loading. after that my game will continue to load and  join the game but i will not be able to see the game just where my loading screen has froze.If i am to alt tab out it will show the unfrozen screen for half a second and will  than will have me alt tabbed. if i try to go back into the game it will still be running but all i will see is a black screen.
Things i can think of i did around the time if this starting is 
1. use msi afterburner ( i have uninstalled already no change)
2. download and play battle field bad company 2

replies.body:
It's hard to say exactly why this could be happening, but everything about this seems to point to some sort of hardware/software interaction.  It looks like you are able to connect to the individual game server, but nothing can appear on your screen.  Since your hardware does most of the hard lifting when it comes to display, there might be an issue there.

Make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Game Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes).  It has a ton of steps, but every single one is crucial in hopefully resolve this issue.  

If you are still seeing the same issue, reply back and let me know!

I have a problem similar to this as it lets me get through champion selection but as soon as the time ends and the load screen should appear it goes black and wont let me reconnect. It tells me its a server connection issue but it was working just fine a few minutes ago. It works when I uninstall league and re-install it but it doesn't stay fixed. Nothing else that is online has worked.
